column4: Is it possible to automatically forward an external port from my computer, then automatically close said port when no longer needed?
i imagine you could set up automated ssh tunnles.. if that would do what you need. or are you morre into needing iptables type forwarding?
I am interested in setting up automated ssh tunnles that if possible, don't require the user to mess with their router settings
with all the scripting tools and stuff.. i would imagine so
